text: Alex Dockery Dickson Jr. (September 9, 1926 â€“ November 14, 2021) was an American Anglican bishop. He was first bishop of the Episcopal Diocese of West Tennessee from 1983 to 1994. He was Bishop in Residence in the Anglican Diocese of South Carolina at the Anglican Church in North America in his last years. Dickson died on November 14, 2021 in Charleston, South Carolina at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Episcopalian bishops Category:People from Tennessee Category:People from Mississippi
title: Alex D. Dickson
